thread.title: The Top 20 Colleges With the Most Outrageous Party People
thread.title_full: The Top 20 Colleges With the Most Outrageous Party People

title: The Top 20 Colleges With the Most Outrageous Party People
text:
The Top 20 Colleges With the Most Outrageous Party People Written by: Andrew Meola 08/22/15 - 7:47 AM EDT 
NEW YORK (TheStreet) -- College is a place of education and growth, but it's also a place where students can cut loose and have fun. Whether they head to a bar, a frat party or some other social gathering, students at the various institutions of higher learning across the country look forward to enjoying themselves. 
So, which schools have the most intense party-goers? Where can we find the students who are ready to go at a moment's notice and who make other school's parties look like Chuck. E Cheese events by comparison? 
Thanks to the folks at Niche , now we can find out for sure. Niche users shared their opinions on the party scenes at the colleges they currently or recently attend(ed). Schools with high rankings are considered to have a lively party scene with a number of options both on and off campus, and students who consider their peers to be fun, outgoing, friendly, and into partying. We've also included some useful comments from those users. More Headlines
